website_summaries.verdict: A stylish, sturdy and timelessly designed TV stand that is a great value. This deep oak wood finish will work in contemporary and traditional homes.
pros: Behind the stand cupboard doors is storage enough for 68 CDs or 52 DVDs, with adjustable shelving
The center exposed shelves are adjustable to accommodate audio and video equipment
Easily fits a television of up to 37 inches and 95 pounds or less
Includes concealed shelving for DVD and CD storage
cons: Some users report receiving damaged parts out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Assembly
customer_reviews.text: The final product looks nice but looks can be deceiving. The pressed wood is soft and the laminate comes of easily. The whole thing took over 3 hours to assemble and the pieces were laid out in the cheepest way possible. They should have used better predrilled holes, and gotten tighter angle brackets. Better yet they could have used some kind of tongue and groove system to make sure all the pieces were flush. The whole thing came out a bit crooked, and one of the doors does not sit flat. Luckily one thing saving this product's review is that it looks great put together. Thankfully all of the scars and cut corners don't show.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Capobianco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent piece of furniture. It is easy to put together if instructions are followed. Parts are well marked and illustrations are clear. The stand is very solid and secure. The finish is attractive and the doors open and close smoothly. It is a few inches taller than most stands, which proves me with a the viewing angle I want. Mine is placed in a difficult corner so stand is a couple inches short of being pushed tightly into the space. However, with that small extension into the room, the stand easily and safely accommodates my new 48" t.v. I couldn't be more pleased.Thank you Sauder!
customer_reviews.author: LJP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Fits the corner in our small living room perfectly. Super easy to put together - I did it in about an hour by myself (29-year-old woman). Had a small hiccup halfway through with the bottom not coming on right and the back of the cabinets not sticking in right, but that was easily remedied. I wish it came with more shelves for inside the cabinets - there’s a lot of wasted space if you’re storing DVDs or Blu-ray Discs in a row (like normal), but I just stacked them on top of each other. 2 shelves per cabinet instead of just 1 would have been perfect. But, it’s perfect anyway.
customer_reviews.author: John T Hill IV

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This kit was easy to put together, it is sturdy and holds the TV components with plenty of "breathing" room so no worry about overheating (and yes, some digital components can get warm). There are storage compartments on either end which could hold DVD's extra HDMI (or other) cables, etc. It is a very attractive piece complementing the Oak paneling in the family room and has the sound bar sitting on top (under the TV which is wall mounted. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this corner TV cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I love this corner TV cabinet. It arrived today in perfect condition due to a very sturdy carton, excellent positioning of pieces in the carton and styrofoam positioned to prevent damage. The direction booklet clearly and simply provided step by step instructions. All the many pieces needed for construction of the cabinet were provided. It took awhile to construct but the cabinet looks great, so well worth the time. The cabinet is very sturdy. I would definitely recommend this corner TV cabinet or any Sauder product.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly - especially in a small living room. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly - especially in a small living room. Has side cabinets that you can store DVDs in (I store books)shelves for your equipment. they are adjustable. I us one shelf for my DVR?cable box and removed the second shelf to store quite a few of my vinyls. In a small house, storage and multi-function pieces are so important. Sauder is pressed wood/laminate, but they have come a long way in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Really great stand
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this. It took what felt like a long time to put together, but the clarity and ease of the instructions meant that I was never frustrated, confused, or irritated - it was a surprisingly pleasant experience and the instructions were, I can't stress this enough, GREAT. Once assembled, the product looks great as well. It looks a lot more expensive than it was, and overall I'm super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kipfer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Received this cabinet in 5 days (exactly as quoted) and this was pretty amazing as it was the week before Christmas. Well packaged, GOOD instructions (follow the instructions), All of the hardware was there and everything fit like a glove. This cabinet was of a MUCH BETTERQUALITY then I expected for the price. VERY IMPRESSED.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Time to construct this piece is likely to take more than 2 hours.
customer_reviews.text: My husband did not find the directions to be clear. Twice he installed a piece which he later found was upside-down. Shading the drawing of the large bottom piece in the booklet would help identify which side is not seen/exposed. The corner "fit" is fine, but again, it did not show that the back was parallel to the front and that there would be empty space in the corner of the room.. Several pieces had no letter stickers (probably as there were two identical pieces and placing a letter sticker on the second piece was deemed unnecessary). Finished, it looks good and is a pretty close match to the wood of our wall bed unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy Entertainment unit with EXCELLENT customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this entertainment piece. I would have given it 5 stars if it weren't for the bottom piece was damaged upon delivery HOWEVER, Sauder customer Service is A+. They sent me a replacement bottom piece in less then 5 days, free of charge. The directions are simple to follow. Each piece has a sticker with a letter code and the instruction booklet coincides with each lettered piece. If you read slowly and follow each page carefully (not tightening pieces when told) you'll have it assembled in no time
customer_reviews.author: A. Atta

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv stand - everything as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This corner tv stand fit perfectly in a very awkward little corner we had for our tv ! I couldn’t love it more . We had a professional assemble it only because my husband and I both have back problems and could not get down on the floor to do it. He was quite pleased with the instructions and the way it went together. All in all , a winner !
customer_reviews.author: Noreen Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Looks very nice and took about an hour or so to assemble by myself. INSPECT THE PARTS BEFORE STARTING ASSEMBLY. I of course didn’t and had a damaged piece that was right in the front. I contacted seller via their website and it was very easy online to get a new part shipped right away. Very sturdy so far and we’ve moved it a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: Shoomary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stand for the $
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, good looking TV stand for a great $. It was very well packaged and arrived with no damage. I hate putting this kind of furniture together (old man with no handyman skills)- but this one was a breeze. The assembly instructions and hardware were perfect- I had it together by myself in under 2 hours. Have a 39" TV on it in the corner of the den- very very happy with this purchase !!
customer_reviews.author: LBIguy

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for our living room
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece, I think it is so beautiful. It did take a few hours for my husband to put together but the directions were easy enough to understand. He did end up drilling some holes into the back of the shelves to get cords through. I thought it was strange they didn't do that for you because everything you'd want to put in the shelves would obviously have a cord involved. This was totally worth the money though as that was an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice TV cabniet.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very nice quality for the price. Did not find anything close to this nice for the price. Very pleased and looks great in our livingroom. Put our second tv in here and it is a 46" lcd. The screen is wider than the cabniet, with no problems what so ever. Very pleased in this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: juicesqueezer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price and also fairly easy to assemble. It could use premade holes in the back panel for cords but it was easy enough to make the hole. The cabinets doors open and close well. They appear to be pretty durable because my kids sit in bean bag chairs right in front of it and are constantly opening and closing the doors with their feet.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy stand. It was easy to put together and quite solid. While it was for a 37 inch TV, we put a 47 inch on it with no problems. It also took up far less floor space than my previous stand. I'm pleased with the product and think it is a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this tv stand
customer_reviews.text: It was time to upgrade one of our tv stands and this was a great choice. The finish is very nice - and a close match for our bedroom furniture. It doesn't take up much space as a corner unit. We have a 46 inch tv on it and it's just fine. The shelves below are just the right size for cable box, play station, blu ray player and modem.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey F

customer_reviews.title: Package was in perfect condition. Picture tells the story accurately
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly! Package was in perfect condition. Picture tells the story accurately. It was just want I wanted and price was "spot on". Would definitely recommend this for a small corner media cabinet. Not too big or small with nice storage behind the doors. Assembly takes some time, but directions are great, as others have reported. Don't get in a hurry and the cabinet comes together nicely! I am very pleased with this cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Kay T.

customer_reviews.title: Company has a sense of humor
customer_reviews.text: Best set of directions ever. Little bit of humor here and there helped. Unit looks good and is what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Lagorio

customer_reviews.title: Photo speaks for itself!
customer_reviews.text: Vundabar! Great! Fantastic! Beautiful! Built it in a few hours by myself (I'm 67 yrs. Old and female). Yes! Women can do this! The instructions were great, all parts were marked and no screws were missing!!! If I had more space I'd get another one and use as a corner bar!
customer_reviews.author: scriptwr

customer_reviews.title: Nice corner cabinet TV stand
customer_reviews.text: This Sauder TV stand even better than expected. Nice and sturdy and looks great. Takes a while to assemble, but worth it. Pretty good instructions and everything labeled. Still, it's like putting together a 1,000 piece puzzle. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV stand for small space.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is exactly what we needed for our small sunroom/den. Because it fits in corner it conserves floor space. The new tv we purchased needed 33” to fit stand. The actual width of the top of the stand is 36” so it fits nicely. I really like the Abbey Oak finish. The only negative is that the instructions to assemble are confusing.
customer_reviews.author: NanHG

customer_reviews.title: ... for over a year and still holds up just fine. Wasn't too hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over a year and still holds up just fine. Wasn't too hard to put together. Looks nice. Actually took the two middle shelves out when I got my Alienware Area-51 (which is a HUGE pc) and fits perfectly in the middle. Holding up a 55" flat screen tv. Have more than enough room in the two cabinets for my microphone, batteries, flash drives, cigarretes, etc. Well done
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Solid construction. Not too hard to put together but you really need to pay close attention to the instructions! I had the top on incorrectly and realized it after the doors wouldn't fit. I thought it was unfixable at that point, but I simply had to remove all the screws from the top, then move it to the proper location and screw back together. It's perfect and looks great! I've received many compliments. I'm a 40+ year old female without any prior experience with putting together furniture.
customer_reviews.author: P. smith

customer_reviews.title: its a great stand and looks very nice. doesnt look cheap at all.
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money. It is very stable and look great. I was surprised at how many compliments I got after putting it up. It is not that hard to put up however make sure you read the directions very well or you will end up backing up a few steps. It does take a while to put together though so set aside a few hours and have fun. lol it is a great stand.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking furniture
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a corner unit I bought 10 years ago. I think I that improbably paid about the same as this well priced Sauder unit. I took my time taking apart the old setup, organizing the cables etc. Then I set out all the pieces for the Sauder and started putting it together. It went together quickly, easily and looks really nice. I used a cutter and opened up the back holes for the cables and set about putting everything back in. Previously, I had some equipment stacked on other pieces, but I was able to spread out everything and put it all back together easily. I am pleased with the unit and it looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: RonC

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: A little more care in packaging would have eliminated the scratch found on the side of the stand. Otherwise it took about an hour toassemble, all the pieces and a few were included and best of all it looks great in the corner and serves my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted and expected
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived well packaged and damage free. When together with a hammer and screwdriver in about 30 minutes. Overall this looks nice in the corner of the room. Wanted something smaller to fit back between windows in a corner. It has great hidden storage of movies and stuff. It is veneers and press-wood, so don't expect it to compete with a $400-600 unit made of sturdier or solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Kemperman

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic part one 1 door doesn't keep door shut!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars except one of the doors doesn't stay closed (magnetic part). It keeps opening up! Other than that, good quality n sturdy and easy to assemble! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Whorton

customer_reviews.title: Looks and preforms excellent.
customer_reviews.text: While the instructions need a lot of work, which, of course, impacted assembly. If you can put up with vague instructions is some areas of he process, this is a great entertainment stand. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: TXR

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly great product
customer_reviews.text: Just received and assembled this corner tv stand. Instructions were clear and easy to follow. Parts were all labeled. Seems very sturdy. No missing parts. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Smith

customer_reviews.title: A-Okay T.V. Stand
customer_reviews.text: This will do for now. It's definitely evident, without even getting too close, that this wood is partial board covered with whatever it is they use (wood like wallpaper? or is it a plastic-y paint?). But - you can not beat price, especially in a pinch to get a t.v. up and running in a room. We did not put the plates behind the handles, and I believe it looks better. Construction and assembly-wise, everything was good.
customer_reviews.author: Chryscynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect corner book case tv stand!
customer_reviews.text: So surprised by how sturdy and perfect this is. We've been looking for a corner book case/ tv stand for awhile now. I'm very happy with this purchase. Holds 100 or so books and has shelfs in the middle for toys or whatever you'd like. Easy to assemble, study, and a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ver serviceable
customer_reviews.text: We use the stand for a tv in a mountain cabin. It was ray to assemble (about an hour) and has plenty of storage for DVD’s, pc’s and other peripherals.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Brayshaw

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great in small room
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my Mom's room at an assisted living facility. It is not used in a corner but still looks great and functions well. Mom loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: Putting together was okay, thought the directions needed to be a little more detailed. But as for quailty I'm very happy. Just right size for my 32" TV. enough shelves for all of my extra electronic plug ins.
customer_reviews.author: A Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good piece.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this has been a great piece since we have it in the basement and don’t use it everyday. It looks great and wasn’t that hard to put together. I did it in about an hour with a toddler climbing all over me.
customer_reviews.author: BRob

customer_reviews.title: It was one of only a few with this height I could find and this one was the best value. Our cat also likes the bottom shelve ...
customer_reviews.text: Typical Sauder quality, heavy duty composite board, a few spare parts, easy-to-follow instructions. Takes about 45-60 minutes to assemble. Just wide enough for our 43" Visio TV. It was one of only a few with this height I could find and this one was the best value. Our cat also likes the bottom shelve too!
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Not solid hardwood but more than adequate. Easy to assemble. only missing is a hole in the back panel for wires on accessories, easy to drill cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Great stand.
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Great instructions. Easy to assemble, though took my wife and I over an hour. Solid. Looks great. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product. Looks just like the picture when you're done assembling it. Assembly took an hour or two, but it was pretty clearly laid out in instructions. I have a 32 inch flat screen on it that used to sit on an old speaker, this really dressed up the corner of the room.
customer_reviews.author: George Fuller

customer_reviews.title: When following the steps, it is assembled upside down take note.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in perfect condition and had all of the parts required to assemble it. It took me about 3 hours by myself but this was at an on and off pace. Do note that it has you build it from the bottom to the top so make sure you're able to flip it or put it on a bed where you can maneuver it around. Overall it looks nicer in person and the pictures of it don't do it justice. It can fit a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pazos

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for space saver and had torn down computer table. This is great and looks great in our den and for CDs and VHS storage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Really good buy
customer_reviews.text: I hired someone to put the unit together and it was done in less than an hour and a half. The color was just a little darker than I thought but it looks great. The height is perfect for TV viewing and the shelves with side panel doors make it an attractive piece. The TV has sufficient room so I don't have to worry about it falling and the pop out for cabling has two locations to choose from which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: M J  S

customer_reviews.title: Son & Daughter-in-law love it
customer_reviews.text: They just bought a new house and asked for this. They love it, easy to put together and sturdy and looks good. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. O'neill

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand, Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand. It only took me 2 hrs to put together. But if you have help, I'm sure it will take have the time. The directions were very easynto follow. It's tall and sturdy. My only negative comment is that a lot of the pieces had nicks and chips, and the molding piece that fits up top had a huge Crack in it which I had to super glue together. But I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Great looking.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is very sturdy. Assembly a little complicated, with only me to do it. Perfect for its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like Walnut Color
customer_reviews.text: We love the stand, but didn't realize how dark it was, a walnut, as the image looks lighter, and ruined the light-med oak look of the living room. We don't like anything else online or in stores, and wish you had these dimensions on your Highland finish stand.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructs were easy and explicit - got it together in just under 2 hours, looks great and for a good price. I wanted to hide a few of my electronics in the cabinet area and there are only two holes for wires which are both in the open section so I drilled my own with a drill saw. I got lucky and my cable receiver fit perfectly in the center section.
customer_reviews.author: timma

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Yes,its compressed particle board, but very sturdy.I bought them for bedrooms, to save space. Wonderful. Instructions easy and clear even give you a pump up saying you are doing good. Which I find very funny. I bought two put both of them together in less than four an half hours with breaks and by myself. Worth the time and money. Will buy again, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: April Monteith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy with this product! It looks great, and I would not hesitate to order another should I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my parents. They were really happy with it and I help put it together. Assembly wasn’t difficult just tedious. I am pleased with the item especially for the price. Nothing fancy but it seem to be what my parents were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica_alain

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: We picked this because of the brand name and we needed a corner tv stand high enough so we can watch TV from the bed. Met all the requirements, in fact exceeded them. Good quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Din R

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace my previous TV stand and decided to go with the corner TV stand. The instructions were amazing and gave very step by step pictures, which I appreciated. The quality of the wood is good--the package it came in weighed 70 LBS if that's any indication of something well made. I put it together while watching a Nebraska football game and then finished shortly after the game ended. I would definitely buy from this company again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Medow

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and was more affordable than any other of this ...
customer_reviews.text: We assembled this without a problem in about 2.5 hours. It looks nice and was more affordable than any other of this quality. We did have a friend make 2 more shelves for the side cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Would rather have rollers on the bottom. Otherwise I love it. Put it together by myself in a couple of hours and the color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best TV stands I've ever bought. It was super easy to put together (took about an hour by myself) and is very sturdy. The directions are great. I'm extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: rmdev

customer_reviews.title: Love this stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand! I have a 55-inch flat screen TV wall-mounted in the corner of my master bedroom. This corner stand sits beneath the TV, storing not only the TV's components, but books and other items as well. All wiring has been discreetly covered. A Bose radio, digital clock, and two favorite 8" x 10' family photos adorn the top of the stand. Simply a beautiful corner of the bedroom, thanks to this Sauder Harvest Mill unit!
customer_reviews.author: Donald A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice result.... really good price!
customer_reviews.text: Although instructions were somewhat lacking, unit came together and is really nice! Love the final product.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Good quility
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand. Workmanship is very good. Directions for assembly easy to understand .took about an hour. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is just the perfect table for us. Looks very nice, fits 50" TV easily, good materials, looks much more expensive than it cost. Take some time to put it together and one has to be careful in following the not-so-clear instructions. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Don Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a gouge on top
customer_reviews.text: Nice item. Arrived with a gouge on the top edge. Pretty disappointing. Assembly wasn’t too har if you’ve ever done any of this type furniture before.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lingo

customer_reviews.title: you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. Took about an hour and a half to put together. Was missing a strike plate, which sauder is sending one after contacting. Some pieces were chipped on the edges but not anything major. It's definitely worth $85 dollars, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For a faux-wood unit, this cabinet looks very nice! It does take a couple of hours and focus to assemble, but I was able to do it alone. Recommend assembling on hard surface floor with lots of room. Color is as pictured in advertisement. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mynier

customer_reviews.title: Very solid and stable, space-saving stand . .  .
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and stable. Doesn't take up much space. Easy assembly. Will hold a good sized flat screen TV - just pay attention to the spacing of the TV "feet" or stand relative to the size of the top and it will work fine for you. Sauder makes the best "assembly required" furniture in my opinion and Amazon has a great price on this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like photo. Give yourself some time to assemble. Lots of pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: This stand is even better in person!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect corner TV stand. Easy to put together and I (61 female) did it alone. The parts were well organized and the instructions were clear (when they say make sure the pegs on one part are correctly inserted) pay attention.
customer_reviews.author: compelled to speak up

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not at $120.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a chip on the finished side of the top and safety legs/pegs are shorter than the perimeter so the peice completely tilts back if you lean or out weight on it wrong (top/back). Otherwise, it looks just as it is photographed. If you don't have experience putting together furniture, assembly may be a bit tough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's very nice looking for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice looking for the price, and was easy to put together. One side piece was broken in the box, but I chose not to go through the ordeal of repacking it and sending it back, since I don't think it affects the stability and it is against the wall anyway. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Carr

customer_reviews.title: Quite easy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Came in a nice wrapped box in very good shape. Directions were quite easy to follow and all holes lined up perfectly. Bought a tv stand to place on top since i was using a 43 inch tv that was too long. I knew this in advance. Looks good in my bedroom and has plenty of storage. Over all seems pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a TV stand. It was wonderful to have someone come and assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie W.

customer_reviews.title: allow yourself enough time to put it together
customer_reviews.text: I needed a guality corner cabinet and this one did. It is very sturdy. My son put the cabinet together...took him about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing in our home and is absolutely perfect for our TV
customer_reviews.author: Gammie

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy tv stand, works great in our small living room, looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bannister

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect for our space. A little time consuming in putting together but good instructions with lots of parts
customer_reviews.author: heather chandley

customer_reviews.title: Wow was i surprised when this arrived the poor deliver guy this is surprisingly heavy up two flights ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow was i surprised when this arrived the poor deliver guy this is surprisingly heavy up two flights on stairs i could barely push box inside . Easy to assemble sturdy built to last . Very amazed that was priced so affordabley
customer_reviews.author: viki larson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: We love this tv stand. It is quite durable and simply a classic look. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: LOVE !!!
customer_reviews.text: It is MUCH more than I expected, in looks and it is perfect for my 43 inch TV. My grandson put it together and he didn't have ANY problems. I could not be happier with this product !!! ♥
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this piece
customer_reviews.text: I looked for quite some time for a small corner entertainment stand when we chose to move our tv. I am very happy with this piece! It is understated, fits well into our space and is good quality for the price! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Judy T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits well in my living room and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, fits well in my living room and I got a corner mount for my tv so I put a lamp on this and it looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: kipsych

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, easy to put together, a few minor imperfections, but for the cost, I can live with them. Nobody will see them but me.
customer_reviews.author: Rosiemac

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for. Additionally, it was easy to put together with excellent directions! The quality is superb!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Actually put it together without the doors and I like it much better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchase of this Product NOT recommended
customer_reviews.text: Product has very flimsy base and comes apart when moving it! Bottom of unit will need to be reinforced with cross members I will have to add myself to make it sturdy enough! Pretty disappointed in overall quality of this product!!
customer_reviews.author: John W. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: This cabinet looks like it cost 3 times the price (at least) and ...
customer_reviews.text: I will only buy Sauder from here on out. This cabinet looks like it cost 3 times the price (at least) and putting it together was a joy. I have put together a lot of furniture and this was the best, by far. The directions and pictures were clear and easily understood. As long as you take the time to carefully follow the directions, there is no reason you, too, can't assemble this with ease, and all you need is a Phillips screwdriver and a hammer. The end result is a quality piece of furniture. It is easy to tell this is made in America.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Buffaloe

customer_reviews.title: It went together easily and looks so rich
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how anyone could possiblity find fault with this corner stand. For the money, you could not go wrong. It went together easily and looks so rich. It is not flimsy and VERY sturdy. I would recommend this for anyone looking for a good deal and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: InADaze

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, not great
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty nice. Some of the wood looked worn, slightly damaged, not enough to return. The shipping people should be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: Kris LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and is really sturdy
customer_reviews.author: mykindarain83

customer_reviews.title: Good assembly instructions and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrived intact by UPS. Packaged well too! Good assembly instructions and easy to assemble. All holes predrilled perfectly. My granddaughter and I assembled the unit in about an hour and a half. Looks great with our other more expensive furniture. I recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive, quality, solid piece of furniture. Thanks Sauder Harvest Mill!
customer_reviews.author: Russ Bush

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed !!
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions - took awhile but easy to follow. End result - top side of unit was 1/2 inch diff making one door stick out ! Door just doesn't fit right and too much space showing around door. Attached pic cause hard to explain. Following these directions exactly and thought I might have done something wrong - the back is perfectly aligned and I can't see where I could have made a mistake. Disappointed but luckily its next to my desk and not that noticeable. The other thing is the back is not in a V type shape to actually fit flush in a corner. (added a pic showing the problem but only the pic of the good side appears!)
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. Careful of weight
customer_reviews.text: This stand fit perfectly in the corner. Highly recommended. Careful of weight, max is under 90 lbs. Probably better to keep it under 75. The shelves are adjustable in the middle and inside the two compartments. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RussusDraco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect assembly
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all. Holds a large TV very well!
customer_reviews.author: Justin H

customer_reviews.title: Fits 42” Tv
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and it matches the desk perfectly. I installed w/o bottom elevation because I have a 15 month old and I didn’t want her to accidentally tip the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: jerseyjazz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy, attractive, just perfect for our corner of the living room TV.
customer_reviews.author: Don's Daughter

customer_reviews.title: nice Corner Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that this is a small cabinet and it fits fairly well in the corner. It looks great and it sturdy. The inside of the doors on each side are VERY shallow so you can't store much inside. Wish it were deeper and it would be perfect for my need.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Very well pout together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and a beautiful high quality piece of furniture/very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time, and had all the pieces (and all the pieces were in nice shape). My husband put it together in less than two hours and it was an easy job. It is a great piece of furniture - heavier and better made than I thought it would be. I love the space it gives us - plenty of storage for DVD's and audio/video equipment. It also looks great, it really updates our living room. Love that it is made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Lane

customer_reviews.title: Study because kids are in the room.
customer_reviews.text: This product was heavy and went together well. Somewhere I missed in the direction that the bottom piece was offset maybe a inch to make doors fit right. I had to take it apart to fix. I very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we want it to do--love the look--the ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we want it to do--love the look--the only caveat is the ease of putting it all together--with directions that are unclear so you're left guessing where some of the pieces are meant to go.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie T.

product_meta.title: Sauder Harvest Mill Corner Entertainment Stand, For TV's up to 37", Abbey Oak finish
product_meta.description: Utilize the corner space in your home with this corner entertainment stand from the Harvest Mill collection. It accommodates up to a 37" TV, making it the perfect spot to binge watch all your favorite shows and movies. It features two adjustable shelves to hold a DVD player, gaming consoles, or display home décor. Behind each door is a hidden storage area with an adjustable shelf. Finished in beautiful Abbey Oak, this space saving TV stand adds stylish functionality to any room.
feature_bullets: Accommodates up to a 37" TV weighing 95 lbs. or less
Storage area behind the corner entertainment stand doors has an adjustable shelf and holds 68 CDs or 52 DVDs
Two adjustable shelves hold audio/video equipment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars537 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
